content.rendered:
Source: https://minecraft.curseforge.com/projects/minecalc

Adds a simple calculator you can interact with ingame chat! Works when installed on Singleplayer or on Multiplayer. NOTE: Server must have mod installed for functionality on multiplayer.

Usage (Where [] denotes optional arguments and <> are required): /Calculate [boolean: use OOPS] <number><symbol><number>[symbol][number], with an infinite number of extra ` [symbol][number]` groups being appendable. You can add as many extra symbols and numbers as you want. Now supports () parenthesis to further control the order of operations. Uses Order of OPerations by default.

Symbols supported: Addition (+), Subtraction (-), Multiplication (*), Division (/), Remainder (%),  Exponents(^), and Roots(/–).

Special numbers: ‘PI’ returns the value of pi, ‘E’ returns the value of Euler’s number, and ‘L’ returns the last output the user received.

Also supports decimals and negative numbers.

Comprehensive guide is available at the Github Wiki.

There are several config options to suit you.

Feel free to include this in modpacks, and it would be awesome if you could include a link to here or my github.

If you have issues please visit: Here

Note: It is recommended to view at the project site as it shows a better overview for the latest files.

Please leave a comment if you can think of any features or changes you would like made
